changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ruleform.sourcing_authorization ( owner bigserial NOT NULL, -- the resource that owns or is responsible for the product product bigserial NOT NULL, -- the product location bigserial NOT NULL, -- the location of the product quantity_on_hand numeric, quantity_committed numeric, reorder_threshold numeric, id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding this rule research bigint, -- Indicates that this rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The Resource that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed
CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_consumer_fkey FOREIGN KEY (owner) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_location_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT sourcing_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT sourcing_athorization_classification_attri_key UNIQUE (owner , product, location) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.sourcing_authorization IS 'Defines rules stating what network relationships are authorized for particular Resources'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.sourcing_authorization.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.sourcing_authorization.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.sourcing_authorization.research IS 'Indicates that this rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.sourcing_authorization.updated_by IS 'The Resource that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.sourcing_authorization.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
